question:
Martin Luther King, Jr. was more $\(\qquad\)$ than is commonly thought today; it was only in the posthumous process of canonization that his more palatable, less far-reaching political and social visions became prominent.
Two Answers
A. ineffective
B. radical
C. politic
D. immoderate
E. incongruous
F. raucous
